:::Orion/Torca:::

::He was about to fall asleep when he heard the meeting call.  He walked to 
the CF's conference room and sat down::
------------------------------------------------------------------------------

---------------------------------------------
Torca: Alrighty then. This Skulletron may end up good after all.
::He walks to the conference room and sees a young Maximal.  Hmm, this kid 
looked familiar he sits down next to him::
Torca: Whats your name son?
Orion: The names Orion
Torca: Orion eh? My names Torca.
Orion: Torca? THE Torca?
Torca: You've heard of me?
Orion: Sure my dad talks about you all the time.
Torca: Who is your father?
Orion: Bluestreak.
Torca: Bluestreak? Bluestreak was a good friend of mine.
Orion: Yup, my mom and dad escaped to the planet Omiscia and had me, but i 
want in on this war!
Torca: You sound just like your dad!
::Torca smiled, so, thats why he looked familiar.  They waited for the 
meeting to begin::

--part1_20.e4eae19.274f3653_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
